strIntroduction: Explore the fascinating places next to Mexico! In this artistic tour, you have a 1 day tour taking you through Xochimilco and CoyoacÃ¡n, and fall into love with the magical masterpiece of Frida Kahlo.

For the natural adventurers and thrill seekers amongst you, if you are an experienced, certified scuba diver enjoying the surf and sand in the Cancun region, join us for a remarkable dive in the waters off Cozumel, with the area's most renowned dive centre.

strIntroduction: Discover the majesty of Mexico City with this fascinating full day tour that takes in the top sights and attractions of this vast metropolis.

Discover the story and art behind two of the most emblematic Mexican painters: Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera. Visit the â€˜Blue Houseâ€™ museum, Frida Kahloâ€™s home, and the Diego Rivera Studio museum which both exhibit works of art and collections by husband and wife duo on this morning tour full of culture and crafts.

strIntroduction: Enjoy a spectacular day out on the Caribbean. Have fun and sail with us in a Catamaran from Cancun and the Riviera Maya to Isla Mujeres.

Join us on a full day tour around Mexico City that shows you the best this city has to offer. Visit the Unesco World Heritage historical centre, the popular Coyoacan neighbourhood and take a boat ride aboard a colourful trajinera around the canals of Xochimilco.
Visit two of the hidden gems of Mexico in this scenic bus tour: Cuernavaca, City of Eternal Spring, located just 80 km from Mexico City; and Taxco, a Spanish colonial city dedicated to mining silver.
strTitle: Pack Taxco & Cuernavaca and Ciudad Univer & Xochimilco
